title: For Sale  T205 Ty Cobb SGC 30
author: Batter67up

posts.post_title: For Sale  T205 Ty Cobb SGC 30
posts.post_content: Sold. Was up last week for trade and now for sale. This T205 Ty Cobb SGC 30 has a front of a 40 or 50 but has two tiny specs of paper loss on the back that lowers the grade to a 30. It is a real nice card and looks better in person than the photos attached.
Still for trade?  What are you looking for?

[quote name="Runscott" post=947573]I'm not seeing the price.[/QUOTE]

First word says "sold" so I assume it is sold. I missed it the first 2 times I read it too. :(
